title: Jalapeño Parmesan-Crusted Grilled Cheese
source: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
categories: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
directions: Spread one side of each slice of bread with about 2 teaspoons softened butter. Arrange 4 or 5 jalapeño rings over the butter on each slice, pressing down to make them stick. Place the Parm in a shallow dish and press the buttered, jalapeño side of each slice of bread into the Parm. Scatter ½ cup cheddar on the unbuttered side of each of 2 slices, then close the sandwiches (all the Parmed sides on the outside).

Heat a nonstick skillet over medium-low heat. Add the sandwiches and cook, covered, until the underside is golden but not burnt, 2 to 3 minutes. Flip and cook, covered, until the underside is golden but not burnt and the edges are crisp, 2 to 3 minutes.
